interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Stutter-Step " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Episcopalis: Pickled Plums & Polyrhythmic Psalms " .

progression.synopsis: Sensei is given a visceral recap of last Halloween by Sana , ending with him spending the night at the Sakakibara's Home .
trivia: There is variation in the dialogue depending on if Sensei chose to pursue Sara during either Carry Me Home or A Mostly Empty Home .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.37.

navigation.next_event: Transpacific Sadness Symposium III: TWO-HEADED HORSE
